content: this legal text summarizes a court decision made by the district court in ljubljana on september 6 2021 the court case involved the distribution of assets including real estate bank accounts and pension benefits among the testamentary heirs and heirs by law the testamentary heirs a niece and a grandniece received specific real estate properties while the heirs by law including a sister brother nieces nephews and a grandnephew received shares of movable properties based on their relationship to the deceased the court applied certain articles from the inheritance act specifically articles 10 14 15 16 and 17 the deceased person was a citizen of the republic of slovenia and had a daughter the court confirmed the authenticity and validity of the deceaseds will which disposed of immovable property the deceased also had movable assets and the court declared them intestate for the distribution of these assets some heirs accepted the inheritance while others renounced it the court assessed a court fee and issued a final judgment forwarding the decision to the land registry for the registration of ownership rights the text also provides instructions for lodging an appeal including the timeframe required documents and payment of court fees the text is dated march 11 2022 in ljubljana
